name: CITY OF SAN JOSE
sampleDescriptions: General local government issues and local control preservation, including: transportation, infrastructure, economic development, environment, law enforcement, homeland security/UASI, CDBG funding, HOM
Issues related to FCC actions and local government impact. Broadband infrastructure and deployment, including 5G broadband legislation.
Support PFC increase. FAA reauthorization. TSA local law enforcement reimbursement program. CBP staffing and policy.
Monitor federal efforts to designate sanctuary cities and change DOJ grant criteria. Monitor federal efforts on DACA.

FY 2018 Omnibus, FY 2019 budget request and FY 2019 appropriations: HOME, CDBG, Capital Investment Grants/BART, homeless programs,  UASI, juvenile justice, CNCS/AmeriCorps, and CBP funding and policy.
